about_the_game:
This is a supporter pack you can purchase to help support me!

This wallpaper bundle contains all three CGs from the original game, six new illustrations with desktop and phone crops, and five chibi desktop wallpapers.

To access the wallpapers, you will need to go to the Fling with a Tiefling install directory. The easiest way to access these files is by right clicking on Fling with a Tiefling in your Steam library, then "Properties", and go to "Installed Files." Click on "Browse..." and it will take you to the directory.

Additionally, make sure the DLC is installed. While looking through the Properties window, there should be a tab for DLC. Go there and make sure the install box is ticked.
detailed_description:
This is a supporter pack you can purchase to help support me!

This wallpaper bundle contains all three CGs from the original game, six new illustrations with desktop and phone crops, and five chibi desktop wallpapers.

To access the wallpapers, you will need to go to the Fling with a Tiefling install directory. The easiest way to access these files is by right clicking on Fling with a Tiefling in your Steam library, then "Properties", and go to "Installed Files." Click on "Browse..." and it will take you to the directory.

Additionally, make sure the DLC is installed. While looking through the Properties window, there should be a tab for DLC. Go there and make sure the install box is ticked.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 140 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 140 MB available space
